name: Beef Time Adventure
description:
LM = fire

RM = Load

Q = grenade

Story

One night, you wake up hunger, and need to go find food to go back to bed, but all you find is raw beef, and then you eat it, but it's not very good, and then are everywhere, and then you go to bed, and then the you win screen comes up, and then the credits, and then you leave, and then you ask why you played this game, and then you give it a bad review. (No offence taken)

Development:

I spent about 12ish hours on this. Its playable, so that's cool.

Assets:

FREE Music for Puzzle Games

Bed & Bath Furniture Pack

Grenade Sound FX

Particle Shaders Vol. 1

FPS Icons Pack

War FX

Ultimate FPS Weapons Pack (thank you 90% off black Friday sale)

12x70 Rem Ammo Box

Yughues Free Pavement Materials

Space Robot Kyle

I think that's all of them?
